title: Implement Restart the Game function into Single Player mode
body:
Hello everyone,

I am a noob and I spent a lots of time learning new champions / last hitting / jungling in a single player mode against bots. In a pursuing my goal to perfection, I restart the game often and over time (over tens and hundreds of restarts) setting the game is just never-ending and increasingly annoying. Can we have a restart button in the game, that would skip setting the game up? There could be a warning / confirm button, that if we restart the game, stats would not be calculated / displayed, but who cares about stats? ;p only nerds.
